INSERT INTO tbl_order ( order_date , order_time , total_order_price ) VALUES ( DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%y/%m/%d' ) , DATE_FORMAT( CURTIME(), '%H:%i:%s' ) , ? )
INSERT INTO tbl_order_menu ( order_code , menu_code , order_amount ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? )
SELECT order_code , order_date , order_time , total_order_price FROM tbl_order ORDER BY order_code DESC

SELECT om.menu_code , m.menu_name , m.menu_price , c.category_name , om.order_amount FROM tbl_order_menu om JOIN tbl_menu m ON m.menu_code = om.menu_code JOIN tbl_category c ON c.category_code = m.category_code WHERE order_code = ?
SELECT menu_code , menu_name , menu_price , category_name FROM tbl_menu m LEFT JOIN tbl_category c ON c.category_code = m.category_code WHERE orderable_status = 'Y' AND menu_name = ?
